plot: In a post-apocalyptic Tokyo, Japan, the only organisms that remain are animals... that are super hybrids fused with various pastries. Depsite the desolate and grim state of the world, Donyatsu and her friends Begal, Ronya, Baumcougar, and others enjoy every day. Together, they play games such as shiritori, catch, and concentration.
ending_theme: "Toro Ama Chu (とろあまちゅ;Thick & Sweet Kiss)" by Hikari Shiina (eps 1-7)
"NOVA Revolution (NOVAレボリューション)" by StylipS (eps 8-12)
